title: PARA classify system
description: This flow is used to classify notes in the PARA system. It helps you decide if a note should be classified as a project, area, resource, or archive.
author: RafaelGB

nodes.text: Will this help me move a current project or goal forward?
nodes.zettelflowConfig: {"root":false,"actions":[],"label":"First step","childrenHeader":"Will this help me move a current project or goal forward?"}

nodes.text: Will this help me uphold an area of responsibility?
nodes.zettelflowConfig: {"root":false,"actions":[],"label":"No","childrenHeader":"Will this help me uphold an area of responsibility?"}

nodes.text: Will it support one of my interest or curiosities?
nodes.zettelflowConfig: {"root":false,"actions":[],"label":"No","childrenHeader":"Will it support one of my interest or curiosities?"}
